title: Rola samorządu terytorialnego w zarządzaniu niematerialnym dziedzictwem kulturowym [The role of self-government in management of intangible cultural heritage]
content: The example of countries where UNESCO’s 2003 Convention for the Safeguarding of the Intangible Cultural Heritage has been already implemented shows worrying trends over 'economization' of cultural heritage, often leading to a breach of its natural relationship with the local community. In the text there are presented possibilities of local government in the field of conservation, enhancement and transmission of intangible cultural heritage, in the context of sustainable local development. Considerations have been based on case study analysis on intangible cultural heritage management in Municipality of Lanckorona.
